title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for: x = 3

1 point is earned for the local minimum

1 point is earned for the justification

dy dx =0 when x=3 d 2 y d x 2 | ( 3,−2 ) = −y− y ′ ( 3−x ) y 2 | ( 3,−2 ) = 1 2 , MathType@MTEF@5@5@@644B@

so f has a local minimum at this point.

or

Because f is continuous for 1 < x < 5, there is an interval containing x = 3 on which y < 0. On this interval, dy dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaSaaaeaaca WGKbGaamyEaaqaaiaadsgacaWG4baaaaaa@39D3@ is negative to the left of x = 3 and dy dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaSaaaeaaca WGKbGaamyEaaqaaiaadsgacaWG4baaaaaa@39D3@ is positive to the right of x = 3.Therefore f has a local minimum at x = 3.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the separates variables

1 point is earned for the antiderivative of dy term

1 point is earned for the antiderivative of dx term

1 point is earned for the constant of integration

1 point is earned for the uses initial condition g(6) = -4

1 point is earned for solving for y

y dy=( 3−x )dx 1 2 y 2 =3x− 1 2 x 2 +C 8=18−18+C; C=8 y 2 =6x− x 2 +16 y=− 6x− x 2 +16 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaacaWG5b GaaeiiaiaadsgacaWG5bGaeyypa0ZaaeWaaeaacaaIZaGaeyOeI0Ia amiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaiaadsgacaWG4baabaWaaSaaaeaacaaIXa aabaGaaGOmaaaacaWG5bWaaWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaOGaeyypa0Ja aG4maiaadIhacqGHsisldaWcaaqaaiaaigdaaeaacaaIYaaaaiaadI hadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaGccqGHRaWkcaWGdbaabaGaaGioaiab g2da9iaaigdacaaI4aGaeyOeI0IaaGymaiaaiIdacqGHRaWkcaWGdb Gaai4oaiaabccacaWGdbGaeyypa0JaaGioaaqaaiaadMhadaahaaWc beqaaiaaikdaaaGccqGH9aqpcaaI2aGaamiEaiabgkHiTiaadIhada ahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaGccqGHRaWkcaaIXaGaaGOnaaqaaiaadMha cqGH9aqpcqGHsisldaGcaaqaaiaaiAdacaWG4bGaeyOeI0IaamiEam aaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaakiabgUcaRiaaigdacaaI2aaaleqaaaaa aa@6C26@
